Reviews.Title: Nice phone for the price
Reviews.Author: Ashish Jain
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for my wife. Got the white version (seller actually shipped black by mistake which we returned, black with green is horrible looking).My wife is not very tech savvy and needed a good looking small phone with touchscreen. All she wanted is a new generation good looking basic phone.Pros: 1) Very Good looking in white color2) Small size - easy to keep in pocket3) It actually works good as a phone4) Biggest advantage is that it has Android OS5) Web-browsing is great. Sometimes, I play youtube videos on it connecting it to wi-fi at home. Screen is sharp and speakers are great.6) Camera is average, videos recording it very good (resolution is not very high but in small size, its quite clean).Cons: Battery life could have been great.We purchased it more than 6 months back. Its all plastic but build quality is good. We have a small baby who mishandles this phone often but there are no issues yet mechanically or cosmetically.If you wish to have a small sized and sleek phone with touch screen, wifi connection to internet, android OS, average camera, you will not go wrong with it. If you want a phone with much higher capabilities, look somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: arrive safe and as described
Reviews.Author: Rhamadinna
Reviews.Content: love this phone! very good for android beginner user like me. item is in good condition and works very well! it's british product. and i like the fact that this phone doesn't has emblem like at&t;, verizon or other carrier like some other unlocked phones that i see and that my friend bought. only samsung brand on the phone. love it! the only flaw is the adapter for US plug isn't working. so, i must use my own adapter. next time please check the adapter first. other than that everything is great including the headset.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Carol_Vzla
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. quality, comfort and good designall for a low price. Is functional and fast.Ideal for the beginner in Android technology

Reviews.Title: Bad Information Upon Purchase
Reviews.Author: Daric Bennett
Reviews.Content: Everything about the phone was great except for the fact it will not be in service in USA for another 6 months.

Reviews.Title: Came in chineese!
Reviews.Author: Elga Joanna Herrera
Reviews.Content: At first when I first received it and opened the cel, everything was in Chinese. I had to look for another android phone to guide myself with the pictures to change it to English. When I was able to change it, it had apps for Asia and I was not allowe to remove them. Also, the Play Store was NOT INSTALLED! Luckily I like playing around with these things, so I was able to reset the phone and instal an American version of Android, however it's slower and crashes sometimes. I don't live in the US so I wasn't able to return it, otherwise I definitely would have.

Reviews.Title: Really good for price
Reviews.Author: M. Curry
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my sis. She's had it for over six months now. There was a period where it has some glitches - the screen stopped working and she was unable to answer calls (lasted for about a week). But it seemed to work itself out because it's normal again. Pretty good for the money I suppose.

Reviews.Title: language settings?
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: I can't review the product yet, because I cannot yet use it! it arrived with the language set to German (I think) and I can't figure out how to change it to English. The instruction manual is also not in English. Does anyone know how to explain how to change it into English, or know of an online manual that gives instructions?

Reviews.Title: Full product expectations.
Reviews.Author: Juan Zamorano
Reviews.Content: Excellent product worked well, really recommend is a good productoa an unbeatable price, I am happy for this purchase reallmente if needed would buy another product equal.

Reviews.Title: performance according to price
Reviews.Author: Aura Noriega
Reviews.Content: The package came on time and it was as described, the phone gets stucked sometimes but for the price you're paying delivers pretty good!

Reviews.Title: Land charger for Samsung S5570 Galax Mini Touchscreen, Wi-Fi, 3g, Android
Reviews.Author: D. Lewis
Reviews.Content: There is a problem with the type of adaptor they use.  It has two prones that does not fit well when you have to charge the phone. You have to keep moving around to get the charge started.  I hate the  land charger, but like the phone.

Reviews.Title: This phone sucks
Reviews.Author: betty camacho
Reviews.Content: I have a Samsung Galaxy III and read all about the mini.  I expected the same phone, smaller screen and not as much memory.  I got a POS.  Do not waste your money.  I used it 1 week, 6 days and have repackaged it up.....I cant even give it away!  It hangs up, puts calls on hold, you cant hang up, cant set anything up on it.  No power, bad hearing, bad speaker.

Reviews.Title: excellent seller
Reviews.Author: Spyridon P.
Reviews.Content: I have bought three more smartphones similar to this one. Compared to the price it delivers many things and it very reliable.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone, but...
Reviews.Author: Trace
Reviews.Content: Needs more embedded language options. Samsung is generally very good, just needs to be able to use in other countries.

Reviews.Title: It meets my expectations
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is my daugther's first cell phone and she likes it. It cannot be compared with other cell phones, but it's the better in its category.

Reviews.Title: It`s not 3G
Reviews.Author: ender
Reviews.Content: I can`t use the device to get online, it doesn`t conect to the 3g network, just GSM. Not what i order...

Reviews.Title: what i ordered is not what i received
Reviews.Author: C. Harris
Reviews.Content: The item OK ordered is not what I received.  I ordered a 3g galaxy mini white  I received a very generic grey spare phone with no 3g at all.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Kelly Johana Ossa Agudelo
Reviews.Content: It was very useful for all tasks that I need performed on it, nice little addition is, for all the tasks required to've worked well

Reviews.Title: GOOD
Reviews.Author: VE210131maria eugenia arismendi moreno
Reviews.Content: EXELENT, muy bueno el producto.  todo en perfecto estado con todos sus accesorios y funciona perfecto en venezuela. gracias .

Reviews.Title: CARGADOR EXTRAÑO
Reviews.Author: David Lecuna
Reviews.Content: el cargador es sumamente extraño, no es ni europeo, ni americano.  Creo que es asiatico.  Muy Malo,  Deberian traer adaptador para americanos u europeo

Reviews.Title: Just OK
Reviews.Author: edward cullen "ed"
Reviews.Content: The phone was okay.  It's nice looking and very light but feels a little cheap.  It was definitely slower than the new phones out there now but for a basic phone and for texting it is good.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Mauricio
Reviews.Content: This is a low budget phone that provides a high quality functionality. It has a very good material, the speakers sound GREAT, much better and loud than the ones from the Nexus!

Reviews.Title: Compact Phone
Reviews.Author: Mathan
Reviews.Content: Its has Android OS, very compact and perfect phone for ladies. Touch sensitive is very good.The sound clarity is amazing.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: jorge
Reviews.Content: this product has turned out very good, excellent mind, and my son is delighted with it, is what I expected thanks.

Reviews.Title: A phone I was looking for.
Reviews.Author: Surjit1754
Reviews.Content: It is a great deal to get the phone with so many features at a reasonable price.I would have given 5 stars if it had come with earphone & memory card.

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Maggs McKinley
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone! Great size and color. I love the touchscreen! It has a decent camera, not fantastic, but ok :)I am very satisfied with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: The customer service is really bad
Reviews.Author: Jean
Reviews.Content: A very unhappy experience with the Customer Service. I received the phone yesterday, but then found the charger did not work. I called the company's phone number. A guy picked up my phone, then cut off the line. Then I called again, describing the problem. However, he did not firstly answer my question, but told me that I have accent and asked where I am from. It was quite insulting! For the whole process, he was impatient. And finally when the conversation was almost done and he said he would send me another charger. I heard he murmured from another side:"holly".  I have called so many customer service so far, and this was my first experience to meet such an unprofessional and impatient one. If you care more about people's accent, then you do not do customer service.However, I have called the manager today. His attitude is sincere and he has apologized. I hope that the company should train their employee, especially the customer service, to be professional.

Reviews.Title: Worst Of The Worst
Reviews.Author: Guillard Florestal
Reviews.Content: This is the phone that makes me thing a thousand time before I buy a phone not meant to use in the US. Buyers out there be aware that those phone are NO GOOD. I bought three (3) of them, two from this seller, they're all bad phones. When I say BAD, the're bad in every step of the way.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: katiuska
Reviews.Content: sending the phone was fast, it's a great product I highly recommend it. is small, comfortable and the navigation system on the Internet is very fast.

Reviews.Title: sporadic instances of non-responsiveness...
Reviews.Author: SumVani
Reviews.Content: While making a call, my phone becomes non-responsive quite often specially if the screen display is locked/timed-out and it does not get activated even after multiple swipes on screen or by pressing menu button. On most of the occasions i had to just turn off the phone by removing the battery. Later i changed time-out setting from 30 sec to 1 min. Now it does not happen a lot as it used to happen earlier but i still face this issue sometime. Not sure if this is a problem with just the device which i bought from Hasslefree or if its a known problem with this model.

Reviews.Title: Well its ok...
Reviews.Author: Jane
Reviews.Content: Well I liked it but the android installed in it is really bad..its good for buisness but for just having a phone I dont reccomend it. Thats it.

Reviews.Title: it a great phone its price if you are into web surfing
Reviews.Author: kittykat
Reviews.Content: I guess like all touch phone, it is quite tedious to get to the page where you make your phone call. I guess I just need a real phone with real buttons. This phone was hard to set ring tones for individual, cant receive picture without internet service, and can't listned to music on blue tooth. Maybe I am new to this phone.. but then at the same time I was unable to find any info on this stuff anywhere.I have had the phone for almost 2 years since last review, I up it from 3 to 5 star. This is a great phone for it price. Its done everything its suppose, but still have a little problem with ring tones, sometimes I would get wrong ring tone for the person calling in. Yes this did bother me but because the phone seems to have grown on me, I gave it 5 star anyway...and for all the abuse I put it through. Now I am ready for Samsung note 3.

ProductInfo.Features:
Quadband Unlocked for any GSM provider EDGE/GPRS 850/900/1800/1900 Mhz; HSDPA 7.2Mbps, 900/2100 Mhz
3.2" capacitive touchscreen; QVGA (240x320) pixel resolution; 160MB storage, 384MB RAM, hot-swappable microSD card slot (up to 16GB)
160MB storage, 384MB RAM, hot-swappable microSD card slot (up to 16GB)Camera: 3 megapixel fixed focus camera
Wi-Fi b/g/n, Bluetooth 2.1 with A2DP, standard microUSB port, GPS receiver with A-GPS, 3.5mm audio jack
Package contents: Handset, battery, Manual, charger, USB cord, and 2GB micro SD with adapter (outlet adaptor is provided for customers in North America)
ProductInfo.Name: Unlocked Samsung S5570 Galaxy Mini Touchscreen, Wi-Fi, 3G, Android International Smart Phone in Chic White
